luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.3: Oh, thank goodness you're OK! I lost contact with you all of the sudden... I was a tad worried.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.3.more: Oh, thank goodness you're OK! I lost contact with you all of the sudden... I was a tad worried.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.4: Hmmm. You seem to be a bit tuckered out after that long battle, don't you?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.4.more: Hmmm. You seem to be a bit tuckered out after that long battle, don't you?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.5: Why don't you come back to the lab?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.5.more: Why don't you come back to the lab?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.6: When you vacuum a Boss ghost, your Poltergust 3000 gets pretty much full to bursting.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.6.more: When you vacuum a Boss ghost, your Poltergust 3000s get pretty much full to bursting.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.7: But... ho ho... I guess you showed that boss ghost who's boss!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_1_key.7.more: But... ho ho... I guess you showed that boss ghost who's boss!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.3: Good to hear you're still OK! I lost your signal when that lightning struck.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.3.more: Good to hear you're still OK! I lost your signal when that lightning struck.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.4: Hmmm. That was some battle you had there.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.4.more: Hmmm. That was some battle you had there.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.5: Why don't you come back to the lab?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.5.more: Why don't you come back to the lab?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.6: What? You think the lightning damaged the Poltergust 3000?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.6.more: What? You think the lightning damaged the Poltergust 3000s?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.8: Even if that lightning had cooked your goose, your Poltergust 3000 wouldn't even have a scratch! Heh heh!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_2_key.8.more: Even if that lightning had cooked your goose, your Poltergust 3000s wouldn't even have a scratch! Heh heh!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.3: Oh, what a relief! That white mist interrupted your signal.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.3.more: Oh, what a relief! That white mist interrupted your signal.
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.4: Hmmm. You seem to have done some serious work there!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.4.more: Hmmm. You seem to have done some serious work there!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.5: Why don't you come back to the lab?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.5.more: Why don't you come back to the lab?
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.6: We can have dinner while we gaze at these ghost paintings!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.7: Tonight I'll make an old family recipe!
luigis_mansion:dialog.area_3_key.8: Pickled dandelions with barnacles in a diesel marinade!
luigis_mansion:dialog.blackout.2: The elec... the electricity has gone out!
luigis_mansion:dialog.blackout.3: That lightning strike just now must've caused a blackout. I can't see anything in this blasted darkness...
luigis_mansion:dialog.blackout.4: The ghosts will have a run of the place in the dark! Be careful, %s!
luigis_mansion:dialog.blackout.4.more: The ghosts will have a run of the place in the dark! Be careful, everybody!
luigis_mansion:dialog.book_of_riddles.4: ...but turning away from them solves nothing.
luigis_mansion:dialog.book_of_riddles.5: Instead of turning away, turn to the side and look at the mystery from a different view. A way will surely open.
luigis_mansion:dialog.boolossus.1: That scaredy-cat %s had made it this far... Oh, we're so frightened!
luigis_mansion:dialog.boolossus.1.more: Those scaredy-cats have made it this far... Oh, we're so frightened!
luigis_mansion:dialog.boolossus.2: I guess it's our turn, then...
luigis_mansion:dialog.boolossus.3: All right, Boos, let's assume our real form...
luigis_mansion:dialog.boolossus.4: But first, how about giving him a little scare!
luigis_mansion:dialog.boolossus.4.more: But first, how about giving them a little scare!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.1: Outstanding work! You're like a leopard on the hunt!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.1.more: Outstanding work! You're like lions on the hunt!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.12: You move as smoothly as water, my boy! Keep it up!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.12.more: You move as smoothly as water, kiddos! Keep it up!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.13: Aren't you just loving my brilliant inventions?
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.13.more: Aren't you just loving my brilliant inventions?
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.14: It's like you were born to capture Boos, %s!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.14.more: It's like you were born to capture Boos, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.15: Yowzer! You got another one! You're cruising, %s!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.15.more: Yowzer! You got another one! You're cruising, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.16.more: Wow! Do you work out, kiddos?!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.2: You stalk Boos like a master! Hail the fearless Boo hunter!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.2.more: You stalk Boos like masters! Hail the fearless Boo hunters!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.3: Did you see that Boo just give up at the end, %s? Your reputation is spreading!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.3.more: Did you see that Boo just give up at the end, kiddos? Your reputation is spreading!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.4: The tiger creeps up behind its prey... and strikes like lightning!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.4.more: The wolves creep up behind their prey... and strike like lightning!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.5: Tip-top, %s! You remind me of myself at your age...
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.5.more: Tip-top, kiddos! You remind me of myself at your age...
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.6: Ho! You're on FIRE, %s! ON FIRE!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.6.more: Ho! You're on FIRE, kiddos! ON FIRE!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.7.more: You give those Boos what-for, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.8.more: Unbelievable! There's no stopping you, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.9: You're busting out all kinds of wild techniques today, %s!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.9.more: You're busting out all kinds of wild techniques today, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.end.1: OK, now send me the Boo and all the data you've got.
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.end.1.m: OK, now send me the Boo and all the data you've got.
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.extra: Well done, %s my boy! This time I have a special bit of information for you!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.extra.1: Hey, since you're cleaning the place up anyway, it wouldn't hurt to help out the plants in the mansion. You know what plants like, don't you?
Hey, since you're cleaning the place up anyway, it wouldn't hurt to help out the plants in the mansion. You know what plants like, don't you?
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.extra.2: Ghosts other than Boos will not appear in the direction you're looking, so you'll have to sneak up on 'em backward... but I bet you knew that already, heh!
Ghosts other than Boos will not appear in the direction you're looking, so you'll have to sneak up on 'em backward... but I bet you knew that already, heh!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.extra.3: You've seen some small ghosts other than the Boos, haven't you? Well, I'm pretty sure they're ghosts freed from the paintings of the ghost artist, Van Gore. I had a passel of trouble the first time I captured him... I know that artists strive to give life to their canvasses, but this guy brought ghosts to life every time he picked up a brush!

You've seen some small ghosts other than the Boos, haven't you? Well, I'm pretty sure they're ghosts freed from the paintings of the ghost artist, Van Gore. I had a passel of trouble the first time I captured him... I know that artists strive to give life to their canvasses, but this guy brought ghosts to life every time he picked up a brush!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.extra.4: You know about elements, right? Anybody will tell you they form a triangular relationship. Which is to say, water beats fire, fire beats ice, and ice beats water. Heh heh heh... Get me?
You know about elements, right? Anybody will tell you they form a triangular relationship. Which is to say, water beats fire, fire beats ice, and ice beats water. Heh heh heh... Get me?
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.extra.m: Well done, kiddos! This time I have a special bit of information for you!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.fifth_b: You already found five Boos! You're a Boo-snaring maniac!
You already found five Boos! You're Boo-snaring maniacs!
I understand you're worried about your brother, young feller, but just take 'er easy. You have plenty of time still, so try to keep your shirt on.
I understand you're worried about your brother, young fellers, but just take 'er easy. You have plenty of time still, so try to keep your shirts on.
Why not go to the Washroom and splash some water on your face? You'll feel much better, believe you me!
Why not go to the Washroom and splash some water on your face? You'll feel much better, believe you me!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_boo.first_b: Mercy! You've already caught your first Boo! I've been researching those guys...
Mercy! You've already caught your first Boo! I've been researching those guys...
Well, these Boos don't seem to like light much, that's for sure. They do their best to hide in and under furniture when they're stuck in a lit room.
So, then, I reckon that means that turning on all the lights in the mansion is the fastest way to find all of the Boos. Wouldn't you say, youngster?
So, then, I reckon that means that turning on all the lights in the mansion is the fastest way to find all of the Boos. Wouldn't you say, youngsters?
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.10: Heh heh heh... The poor little feller's fallen asleep...
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.11: He must have just collapsed with the relief and exhaustion when he saw you arrive...
He must have just collapsed with the relief and exhaustion when he saw you arrive...
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.12: I'll get the machine ready to return your brother to his former state, all righty?
I'll get the machine ready to return your brother to his former state, all righty?
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.2: %s, you did it! Truly remarkable, my boy!
Everybody, you did it! Truly remarkable, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.3: I supplied the Poltergust 3000, but you ran with it all the way to the top, sonny!
I supplied the Poltergust 3000s, but you ran with them all the way to the top, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.4: You've made me so... SNIFFF... proud... SNORT! (get ahold of yourself, Gadd!)
You've made me so... SNIFFF... proud... SNORT! (get ahold of yourself, Gadd!)
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.5: ...What's that? You found King Boo? He jumped into the painting of Bowser, you say? He even blew fire at you?
...What's that? You found King Boo? He jumped into the painting of Bowser, you say? He even blew fire at you?
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.6: ...Well, well... In all my years of ghost research, I've never heard such a fantastic tale!
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.7: ...And that career spans sixty years, mind you. Why I still recall starting out as a young whelp who trembled at the mere thought of a ghost, TREMBLED, I say...
...And that career spans sixty years, mind you. Why I still recall starting out as a young whelp who trembled at the mere thought of a ghost, TREMBLED, I say...
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.8: Oh, beg your pardon! This old brain goes recollecting every now and then... I could just sit down and fill a week spinning ghost yarns. Why, just last...
Oh, beg your pardon! This old brain goes recollecting every now and then... I could just sit down and fill a week spinning ghost yarns. Why, just last...
luigis_mansion:dialog.caught_king_boo.9: ...Right, well anyhoo, %s! Grab your brother's painting and bring him to the lab!
...Right, well anyhoo, kiddos! Grab your brother's painting and bring him to the lab!
luigis_mansion:dialog.chauncey.1: Ow! You gave me an owie!
luigis_mansion:dialog.chauncey.1.more: Ow! You gave me an owie!
luigis_mansion:dialog.chauncey.2: I just wanted to play with you... I HATE grown-ups!
luigis_mansion:dialog.chauncey.2.more: I just wanted to play with you... I HATE grown-ups!
luigis_mansion:dialog.chauncey.3: ... Why do you have to be bigger than meeee? I've had enough!
luigis_mansion:dialog.chauncey.3.more: ... Why do you have to be bigger than meeee? I've had enough!
luigis_mansion:dialog.chauncey.5: Small! Itsy! Tiny! Little! Wee! Ga ga goo goo GA!
luigis_mansion:dialog.darkness_is_their_: There is a book called Darkness is Their Cheese!
Ghost mice are drawn to darkness as real mice are drawn to cheese...
In the dark, they shine gold with contentment.
I must try to get close to one before the lights come back on. (C. Parmesan)
luigis_mansion:dialog.e_gadds_guide_to_g: You've found E. Gadd's Guide to Ghosts.
Dear readers... We've all had trouble with ghosts who aren't easily surprised, right?
They have all sorts of ways to protect themselves from light.
What would you do, bright folks, when in a fix with one of these stubborn ghouls? Well sir, I'd first look for an opening...
... A way to catch them off guard and unsettle them.
When a ghost is surprised and shows you its heart, that's your chance to catch the little bugger. I tell you, I've caught dozens of ghosts just like this...
luigis_mansion:dialog.extra_gallery_door: This leads to other galleries; to which do you want to go?
luigis_mansion:dialog.fire_element_medal: Hey now, %s! What have you found there? Let's take a look at that.
Hey now, kiddos! What have you found there? Let's take a look at that.
You may have to use the Fire Element to defeat some ghosts... Keep that in mind, sonny! Don't say I never warned you!
You may have to use the Fire Element to defeat some ghosts... Keep that in mind, kiddos! Don't say I never warned you!
A Fire Element Medal! Now you can use the Fire Element!
A Fire Element Medal! Now you can use the Fire Element!
Yes sir, with that, you can catch Fire Elemental Ghosts!
Yes kiddos, with that, you can catch Fire Elemental Ghosts!
Hm? What's a Fire Elemental Ghost, you ask? Why, they show up whenever you see fire, my boy! They're ghosts of fire itself, if you will.
Hm? What's a Fire Elemental Ghost, you ask? Why, they show up whenever you see fire, kiddos! They're ghosts of fire itself, if you will.
If you approach a flame, they'll be surprised by your presence and leap out into the air. Then you can vacuum 'em up right away!
If you approach a flame, they'll be surprised by your presence and leap out into the air. Then you can vacuum 'em up right away!
After that, you can expel fire by using the Poltergust.
After that, you can expel fire by using the Poltergust.
You can melt ice, light candles, do all kinds of stuff.
You can melt ice, light candles, do all kinds of stuff.
A meter will appear down at the bottom of your screen, so keep an eye on how much element you have left, OK, feller?
A meter will appear down at the bottom of your screen, so keep an eye on how much element you have left, OK, fellers?
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.2: I once had 22 paintings in my Famous Ghost Collection, but now there are only frames. What a crying shame!
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.3: Unfortunately, there are only statues here now, but feel free to look around anyway.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.4: Check your surroundings with that Game Boy Horror I gave you. Be sure to search suspicious places extra well.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.4.more: Check your surroundings with those Game Boy Horrors I gave you. Be sure to search suspicious places extra well.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.5: You can also check objects with the interact item by tapping and shaking stuff. Don't try that on the Angel Statues! Heh heh heh...
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.5.more: You can also check objects with the interact items by tapping and shaking stuff. Don't try that on the Angel Statues! Heh heh heh...
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.repeat.1: Are you done appreciating art for today, %s?
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.repeat.1.m: Are you done appreciating art for today, kiddos?
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.what.1: I designed the Game Boy Horror as a communications terminal. It has all sorts of functions.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.what.2: For example, you can open the menu and select the option to see a list of the items you've picked up. Give it a try after you get some coins.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.what.2.mor: For example, you can open the menu and select the option to see a list of the items you've picked up. Give it a try after you get some coins.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.what.3: Of course, you'll also be able to see portrait ghosts there once you capture some.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.what.3.mor: Of course, you'll also be able to see portrait ghosts there once you capture some.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.what.4: You can also use the menu to display a map of the mansion. The display will color the rooms as you visit 'em. Check the map if you ever get lost.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.what.4.mor: You can also use the menu to display a map of the mansion. The display will color the rooms as you visit 'em. Check the map if you ever get lost.
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.1: This is the gallery. This is where I hang all my paintings... ghost paintings, that is!
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.2: When I was young, I designed a machine to turn ghosts into paintings, and I traveled the world collecting 'em. Oh, it was glamorous, I tell you!
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.2.mo: When I was young, I designed a machine to turn ghosts into paintings, and I traveled the world collecting 'em. Oh, it was glamorous, I tell you!
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.3: Well, then. Now I have to tell you... a horrifying story...
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.3.mo: Well, then. Now I have to tell you... a horrifying story...
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.4: The last ghost I caught was no. 22, Boolossus, but there are lots of Boos, and King Boo rallied them all to take revenge upon me!
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.5: They used my machine to free Boolossus from the painting... then they went and turned all my other portraits back into ghosts, too!
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.6: As if that weren't enough, they built a mansion in front of my lab in the space of a single night, and then they all hid inside! If I told anybody else this stuff, they'd probably have me committed!
luigis_mansion:dialog.gallery.where.7: I'm sure my portrait ghosts are somewhere inside the mansion. I just have to get 'em back!
luigis_mansion:dialog.ghost_portrificati: Good job, %s! You made it back in one piece!
Good job, kiddos! You made it back in one piece!
Take a gander at this. This fine piece of work took nearly twenty years to develop! I call it the Ghost Portrificationizer!
Take a gander at this. This fine piece of work took nearly twenty years to develop! I call it the Ghost Portrificationizer!
This machine lets us turn the ghosts you catch into paintings. Not only that, it works in reverse, too!
This machine lets us turn the ghosts you catch into paintings. Not only that, it works in reverse, too!
Hm? How do we use it, you ask? Well, it's simple. Just plug that Poltergust 3000 into that slot and enjoy the ride, my boy!
Hm? How do we use it, you ask? Well, it's simple. Just plug a Poltergust 3000 into that slot and enjoy the ride, kiddos!
This'll mess with your head: All your hard work lasted only a single night! Well done, %s!
This'll mess with your head: All your hard work lasted only a single night! Well done, kiddos!
The mansion those Boos built disappeared into the night, but that treasure seems to be real. I have no interest in such stuff, so go on and keep it all! Use it however you like!
The mansion those Boos built disappeared into the night, but that treasure seems to be real. I have no interest in such stuff, so go on and keep it all! Use it however you like!
Say what? Enough rattling on about money? I guess we'd better get your brother back then.
Say what? Enough rattling on about money? I guess we'd better get your brother back then.
Of course your brother's really important, but first we have to take care of these last ghosts!
Of course your brother's really important, but first we have to take care of these last ghosts!
I'd wager dollars to donuts that nobody but me has such lovely paintings! Heh heh heh!
Go to the Gallery.
Get to it!
Go back to the Lab.
All right, then!
Sorry to bother you.
Just looking?
The ghosts are invisible...
so we need to...
press 'em into visible forms...
and presto! Turn 'em into beautiful ghost portraits!
Hmmm...
Well, we managed to turn those ghosts back into paintings. Thanks for your help, %s!
Well, we managed to turn those ghosts back into paintings. Thanks for your help, kiddos!
What will you do, %s?
What will you do, kiddos?
Good job, %s! You made it back in one piece!
Good job, kiddos! You made it back in one piece!
Looks like you got a vacuum full of ghosts there. What do you say we put 'em through the old Ghost Portrificationizer?!
Looks like you got vacuums full of ghosts there. What do you say we put 'em through the old Ghost Portrificationizer?!
luigis_mansion:dialog.grabbing_ghosts.1: Heh heh heh! Looks like you've run into a bit of trouble there. Maybe you need more training!
Heh heh heh! Looks like you've run into a bit of trouble there. Maybe you need more training!
luigis_mansion:dialog.grabbing_ghosts.2: There are some ghosts who'll try to grab and hold you...
There are some ghosts who'll try to grab and hold you...
luigis_mansion:dialog.grabbing_ghosts.3: When that happens, try moving back and forth to shake 'em off!
When that happens, try moving back and forth to shake 'em off!
luigis_mansion:dialog.grabbing_ghosts.4: It's the age-old struggle for survival, my boy! Don't lose heart, %s!
It's the age-old struggle for survival, kiddos! Don't lose heart, folks!
Hey now, %s! What have you found there, let me see it!
Hey now, kiddos! What have you found there, let me see it!
An Ice Element Medal! Now you can use the Ice Element!
An Ice Element Medal! Now you can use the Ice Element!
Ice Elemental Ghosts are found only in chilly places. You'll probably find them in refrigerators and cold areas like that...
Ice Elemental Ghosts are found only in chilly places. You'll probably find them in refrigerators and cold areas like that...

luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.1: Oi! You! With the mustache! Yeah, you!

luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.2.more: Whadda ya think o' me jar collection, then? Pretty amazing, don't you say?

luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.no.1: Filthy, annoying plumber! Go back to yer pipes!
luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.no.1.more: Filthy, annoying plumbers! Go back to yer pipes!
luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.repeat.2: If you wants to see me jars, let's 'ave it on, then!
luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.repeat.2.mo: If you wants to see me jars, let's 'ave it on, then!
luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.yes.2: See how many o' me you can freeze with that ice, boyo!
luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.yes.2.more: See how many o' me you can freeze with that ice, folks!
luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.yes.3: If you freeze seven o' me, then you win! Righty-right?
luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.yes.3.more: If you freeze seven o' me, then you win! Righty-right?

luigis_mansion:dialog.jarvis.yes.4.more: But if you lose, mates, it's out the door with you!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.1: Aahh, I could just stare at my Mario painting for hours! It's true what they say about fine art... it takes utterly refined sensibilities to truly appreciate it!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.10: I must say... I despise the way you SWEEERRPP-SHOOOOP-WHOOORPP-SHLEEEOOORG-vacuumed up all my friends!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.10.more: I must say... I despise the way you SWEEERRPP-SHOOOOP-WHOOORPP-SHLEEEOOORG-vacuumed up all my friends!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.11: Don't imagine that I'll flee... I'll fight you like a true Boo!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.11.more: Don't imagine that I'll flee... I'll fight you like a true Boo!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.2: They way you plead for help, Mario... I find it so... satisfying.
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.3: Perhaps that is merely because I remember how much trouble you've caused me in the past.
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.4: ...Seriously, though, who would actually believe that mansions get given away in contests?! Talk about stupid!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.5: What do they feed you Mario brothers anyway... gullible soup? Your brother came all this way just to get turned into a painting... It's just terrific.
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.5.more: What do they feed you Mario brothers anyway... gullible soup? Your brothers came all this way just to get turned into a painting... It's just terrific.
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.7: This Mario painting looks lonely... I must have a %s painting as well! Then my gallery will truly be complete! Bleah HA HA!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.7.even_mo: This Mario painting looks lonely... I must have a %s... Oh, I didn't expect this many ghost busters!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.7.more: This Mario painting looks lonely... I must have a painting of all of you as well! Then my gallery will truly be complete! Bleah HA HA!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.8: I am not afraid of you, fool! I fear only that infernal Poltergust 3000 you carry on your back! Stupid machine!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.8.more: I am not afraid of you, fools! I fear only those infernal Poltergust 3000s you carry on your backs! Stupid machines!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.9: But I am a KING among Boos! I swear it... I shall fear no mere house-cleaning device!!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo.9.more: But I am a KING among Boos! I swear it... I shall fear no mere house-cleaning devices!!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.10: Hey, so what's that you got there? A Poltergust 3000?!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.10.m: Hey, so what's that you got there? Poltergust 3000s?!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.13: Good idea, guys! All Boos in this area, gather your strength! We'll blow you away!!!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.13.m: Good idea, guys! All Boos in this area, gather your strength! We'll blow you away!!!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.0: ... We'll take a big Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.1: ... What?! Just one of us left?! No matter!
... The ten of us will take a deep Boo breath...
... Wait, how did you even get here so soon?!
... Wait, how did you even get here so soon?!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.2: ... What?! Just two of us left?! No matter!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.3: ... The three of us will take a deep Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.4: ... The four of us will take a deep Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.5: ... The five of us will take a deep Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.6: ... The six of us will take a deep Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.7: ... The seven of us will take a deep Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.8: ... The eight of us will take a deep Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.14.9: ... The nine of us will take a deep Boo breath...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.4: How did you get out of my...?
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.6: ...Huh? Wait a second... Your clothes look... different...
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.7: Hey, you must be %s! Whoa, you had me a bit confused for a moment there!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.7.mo: Hey, you must be... whoa, more than I thought! You had me a bit confused for a moment there!
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.8: What? You want me to release Mario? Riiiiight.
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.8.mo: What? You want me to release Mario? Riiiiight.
luigis_mansion:dialog.king_boo_warp.9: No, no, no. I will not give up my favorite decoration. I like Mario just where he is.
luigis_mansion:dialog.lydias_child_care_: The twins are very shy for ghosts their age... They've even gone and hid the key to their room far away in the mansion. How very trying...
They got mad at me the other day for twirling their little toy helicopter mobile... Ghost children today! Who knows what they're thinking?
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.1: What... do you seek of me?
What... do you seek of me?
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.g: Hm? What is this object you have there? Show it, please, to Madame Clairvoya.
Hm? What is this object you have there? Show it, please, to Madame Clairvoya.
Now the spirits come!! Come, spirits of power, come spirits of sight! Show to me the awful things occurring here tonight!
Crystal orb, symbol of my clan, use your darkling power to show us all you could! I mean CAN! Show us all you CAN!
The light of the spirits comes, show us what we seek!!
If it isn't Mario's glove! Ah-hah! Still damp with the sweat of the living!
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.h: If it isn't Mario's Hat! Why, it's so clean, as if... SOMEONE JUST WASHED IT!... Sorry, sometimes I like to add a little drama, you know.
If it isn't Mario's Hat! Why, it's so clean, as if... SOMEONE JUST WASHED IT!... Sorry, sometimes I like to add a little drama, you know.
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.i: Hm? Just one moment... Did I just say Mario? Could it be... THAT Mario?

Ahhh, I see now. Well, I see everything, so I saw it before, but now I REALLY see it. So you are the brother of the famous Mario... and you have come to this place to find him... Well aren't you a good little brother! Hack ka ha harf!... Excuse me, I don't laugh much.

Ahhh, I see now. Well, I see everything, so I saw it before, but now I REALLY see it. So you are the family of the famous Mario... and you have come to this place to find him... Well aren't you a good family! Hack ka ha harf!... Excuse me, I don't laugh much.
Ohhhh... Harummm... I see that your Mario lives...
Ohhhh... Harummm... I see that your Mario lives...
Well, he is not in the spirit world... but one cannot say he is alive... haaackth ha ha hork! (Excuse me, sorry.) Where is he? Where is he now? ...Ah the spirits fall silent!
Uuuh... This is all I can tell you for now! Bring me another clue, and I will show your brother to you. This clue no longer speaks to us...
Uuuh... This is all I can tell you for now! Bring me another clue, and I will show your brother to you. This clue no longer speaks to us...
Oooh... Harummm... Your Mario is imprisoned... but where, oh where is he being held?
Oooh... Harummm... Your Mario is imprisoned... but where, oh where is he being held?
Yes! A painting! Your Mario has been imprisoned within a painting! My orb shows an odd altar, and... c'mon you stupid orb... yes! Above it, your Mario! Trapped in a painting!
Yes! A painting! Your Mario has been imprisoned within a painting! My orb shows an odd altar, and... c'mon you stupid orb... yes! Above it, your Mario! Trapped in a painting!
Acch! I cannot concentrate... The spirits are leaving me...
If you wish to know more of your Mario, bring more of his dropped items!
If you wish to know more of your Mario, bring more of his dropped items!
Listen! Can you hear it? The inner voice of your sweet, beloved Mario!
Listen! Can you hear it? The inner voice of your sweet, beloved Mario!
Oh horrors! What is this? ...A king? ...King Boo?! What is this King Boo?!

...I do not understand just what he means, but... Beware of King Boo! This is what your brother wishes to say to you. Ohhh, yes, a Boo who wears a crown. I see! This is King Boo! ...SO! He is the one who captured your Mario!

...I do not understand just what he means, but... Beware of King Boo! This is what your brother wishes to say to you. Ohhh, yes, a Boo who wears a crown. I see! This is King Boo! ...SO! He is the one who captured your Mario!
Ahhhhh! I can say no more! The spirits leave me even now!
Ah-hahhh! I can hear it! Your brother, Mario! He cries out for you!
Ah-hahhh! I can hear it! Your brother, Mario! He cries out for you!
What...? The power of the Boos? You wish to tell us something of their mysterious Boo-power?
Ohh... Harummm... The Boos do indeed have strange powers... When they gather in numbers, their power grows stronger! ...But! They do fear your mighty Poltergust 3000!
Ohh... Harummm... The Boos do indeed have strange powers... When they gather in numbers, their power grows stronger! ...But! They do fear your mighty Poltergust 3000s!
Ugh... I fear that I have only enough power within me to read one more of your brother's dropped items... my strength ebbs away...
Ugh... I fear that I have only enough power within me to read one more of your brother's dropped items... my strength ebbs away...
Ah, the spirits return to me! I see! I see! I see your dear Mario! The scene appears before me....
Ah, the spirits return to me! I see! I see! I see your dear Mario! The scene appears before me....
Ahhhhh! Finally, I can return in peace to my painting... Sweet happiness in oils...
I thank you... I thank you, kind %s!
I thank you... I thank you, kind people!
Wh-what is this?!
Bowser?!
How can this be?! I see the hideous form of Bowser! Is Bowser somewhere in this mansion? I cannot believe it... And yet I see it...
I thought Mario had soundly defeated Bowser! Has King Boo somehow revived Bowser? This could be horrible! Well, for you.
I thought Mario had soundly defeated Bowser! Has King Boo somehow revived Bowser? This could be horrible! Well, for you.
Uggghh! Ahhh no, the powers leave me! The spirits depart!

This is all I can show you, %s... That was the last of my power. But I have given words to what the spirits have shown... so I can return to my painting satisfied. Send me there now, you vacuum-wielding rogue!

This is all I can show you, people... That was the last of my power. But I have given words to what the spirits have shown... so I can return to my painting satisfied. Send me there now, you vacuum-wielding rogues!
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.l: If it isn't Mario's letter! Give it to me! I will read it at once! Erm... Sure it's OK, I'm a licensed letter-reader!
What what? Hm... Let's see... L-o-o-k--o-u-t--f-o-r--B-o-o-s,--%s-!
Is that all? Not a novelist, your Mario. This must have been written in quite a hurry.
Is that all? Not a novelist, your Mario. This must have been written in quite a hurry.
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.n: Ohh... Harummmm... no. I feel no spiritual vibrations right now.
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.s: If it isn't Mario's shoe! Why, the sole is so worn, as if he's walked a thousand miles!
If it isn't Mario's Star! What otherworldly beauty!
luigis_mansion:dialog.madame_clairvoya.y: I am Madame Clairvoya, seer of dropped items. Possessions of people awaken vibrations in my spirit...
If you find someone's dropped items, you should bring them to me. I will show you the extent of my vision...
If you find someone's dropped items, you should bring them to me. I will show you the extent of my vision...
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.2: Ooof... I sure take a lot of knocks in this line of work.
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.3: I'm getting too old for this ghost-catching tomfoolery.
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.4: Anyway, nice to meet you. I'm professor E. Gadd.
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.4.more: Anyway, nice to meet you. I'm professor E. Gadd.
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.5: This house... I swear it seems to have more ghosts every day!
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.6: What's a young feller like you doing around here, anyhoo?
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.6.more: What're young fellers like you doing around here, anyhoo?
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.8: All right, youngster, look lively! Follow me, posthaste!
luigis_mansion:dialog.meet_e_gadd.8.more: All right, youngsters, look lively! Follow me, posthaste!
My name is Melody. People call me the spectral beauty of the ivory keys!
What a stirring performance! I haven't been so charmed by a piece for ages!
You must have a delicate ear for music. Would you like to listen to my piano sonata?
You must have delicate ears for music. Would you like to listen to my piano sonata?
Well, here I go.
By the way... what image do you think the piece's composer had in mind while writing it?
By the way... what image do you think the piece's composer had in mind while writing it?
Sky.
Er, I don't know.
Water.
By the way... that song was featured in a famous game. Do you know which game?
By the way... that song was featured in a famous game. Do you know which game?
Mario Bros.
Super Mario World.
Super Mario Bros. 3.
No, no, NO! That's all wrong!!
I put my heart and soul into that piece, only to be insulted? How could you, you awful man!
I put my heart and soul into that piece, only to be insulted? How could you, you awful people!
Now leave me, and think about your rude behaviour!
Now leave me, and think about your rude behaviour!
Exactly right! You got it!
Exactly right! You got it!
Very impressive! I guess I needn't hold back with you!
Very impressive! I guess I needn't hold back with you!
Would you care to do battle with my lovely Music Sheets?
Would you care to do battle with my lovely Music Sheets?
What a hilarious trick I played on Miss Petunia today!
She jumped into the bathtub after I filled it with ice from the freezer!
She actually started shivering pretty badly, and I felt a bit guilty for a second...
But Miss Petunia is made of solid stuff!
She took a hot shower and felt like new again!
Once she'd warmed up, she wasn't even that mad! (Nana)
luigis_mansion:dialog.mysterious_power.1: Good evening, dunce! I am the mysterious power of the Boos!
Good evening, dunces! I am the mysterious power of the Boos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.mysterious_power.2: Ahh, my little simpleton, don't think you can vacuum ME with that Poltergust 3000! Why? Because, idiot, I am a mysterious power! Duh! Tell me, why can't you just be a good boy and let us turn you into a painting? That desire, the urge of all the Boos to get a nice painting of a fool... That's what created me...

Ahh, my little simpletons, don't think you can vacuum ME with those Poltergust 3000s! Why? Because, idiots, I am a mysterious power! Duh! Tell me, why can't you just be good and let us turn you into a painting? That desire, the urge of all the Boos to get a nice painting of fools... That's what created me...
luigis_mansion:dialog.mysterious_power.3: I cannot let you come further. I despise you and your pathetic Poltergust 3000! Just give up and become a painting, will you? Since that desire is what made me, it is all I can think of...
I cannot let you come further. I despise you and your pathetic Poltergust 3000s! Just give up and become a painting, will you? Since that desire is what made me, it is all I can think of...
luigis_mansion:dialog.mysterious_power.4: There used to be 20 of us in this area, drawing on our collective strength, but our mysterious power decreases each time you catch one of us...
There used to be 20 of us in this area, drawing on our collective strength, but our mysterious power decreases each time you catch one of us...
luigis_mansion:dialog.mysterious_power.5: Ordinarily your fate would be more dire, but tonight is a full moon, and we're feeling merciful... so we'll just blast you back to the front of the mansion!
Ordinarily your fate would be more dire, but tonight is a full moon, and we're feeling merciful... so we'll just blast you back to the front of the mansion!
luigis_mansion:dialog.mysterious_power.r: Hello there nitwit, I am the mysterious power of the Boos that still remain...
Hello there nitwits, I am the mysterious power of the Boos that still remain...
Just try to get all 20 of us if you can, dunderpate! Ha har! Now go back to the beginning and try again, lunkhead!!!
Just try to get all 20 of us if you can, dunderpates! Ha har! Now go back to the beginning and try again, lunkheads!!!
luigis_mansion:dialog.nevilles_big_baby_: You found Neville's Big Baby Care Diary.
My third son is still a baby.
Oddly enough, he seems to scare people in ways the other two never did...
They're afraid of fire, water, cold, and wind!
Why, they shake with fright when beset by the elements!
Sometimes I think they're more childlike than the baby!
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.1: WHO put out my candles?! YOU, Mr. overalls?
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.1.more: WHO put out my candles?! YOU, overall people?
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.2: Well, dark rooms are dangerous around here... Yesss...
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.3: THEY love the dark... and now THEY will get YOU!! Bloo-heh!
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.3.more: THEY love the dark... and now THEY will get YOU!! Bloo-heh!
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.4: Now you're in for it! Blugh-huh!
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.4.more: Now you're in for it! Blugh-huh!
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.5: Just like little Red-Cap before you...
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.5.more: Just like little Red-Cap before you...
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.6: May you wander lost in the darkness... forever!
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.6.more: May you wander lost in the darkness... forever!
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.7: Are you AFRAID of the dark, little man? Are you? Huh?
luigis_mansion:dialog.paintings.7.more: Are you AFRAID of the dark, folks? Are you? Huh?
luigis_mansion:dialog.portrait_ghosts.3: I detect spirits stronger than we've yet seen lurking ahead, I think... it must be some of those escaped gallery ghosts!
luigis_mansion:dialog.portrait_ghosts.4: You should know that they're really different from the other ghosts you've seen so far.
You should know that they're really different from the other ghosts you've seen so far.
luigis_mansion:dialog.portrait_ghosts.5: They don't show their hearts very easily. Nope, not at all.
luigis_mansion:dialog.portrait_ghosts.6: When you find one, you should first use the Game Boy Horror to search its heart for clues.
When you find one, you should first use the Game Boy Horror to search its heart for clues.
luigis_mansion:dialog.portrait_ghosts.7: Sometimes you can learn the best way to surprise 'em!
Sometimes you can learn the best way to surprise 'em!
luigis_mansion:dialog.portrait_ghosts.8: Well, %s, I'll keep my fingers crossed for you.
Well, kiddos, I'll keep my fingers crossed for you.
luigis_mansion:dialog.release_boos.1: Who's there? Who dares disturb our sleep?
luigis_mansion:dialog.release_boos.2: Oh ho! It's %s! Look guys! %s is finally here!
luigis_mansion:dialog.release_boos.2.mor: Oh ho! Look guys! They're finally here!
luigis_mansion:dialog.release_boos.3: We're gonna do to you what we did to your brother... only worse.
luigis_mansion:dialog.release_boos.3.mor: We're gonna do to you what we did to your brother... only worse.
luigis_mansion:dialog.release_boos.4: What's on their back...? It's... E. Gadd's Poltergust 3000!
luigis_mansion:dialog.release_boos.4.mor: What's on their backs...? It's... E. Gadd's Poltergust 3000s!
luigis_mansion:dialog.released_boos_call: That was them! Those were the ones who released all the ghosts from the paintings in my gallery! Those fiends!
I wondered where King Boo and his gang had gone. So, they were hiding in the mansion all along... Thanks for flushing 'em out, %s!
I wondered where King Boo and his gang had gone. So, they were hiding in the mansion all along... Thanks for flushing 'em out, everybody!
I'm tickled you found 'em, but... perhaps it would've been better if you hadn't, well... let every single one escape. Just a thought.
I'm tickled you found 'em, but... perhaps it would've been better if you hadn't, well... let every single one escape. Just a thought.
Ah well, water under the bridge. Anyway, you should probably come back to the Lab for a sec.
Ah well, water under the bridge. Anyway, you should probably come back to the Lab for a sec.
luigis_mansion:dialog.released_boos_talk: I've been waiting for you, young %s!
I've been waiting for you, young kiddos!
All right now, sonny. Don't go tuckering yourself out. Relax, and just try to get those Boos one at a time. The trick is using the direction of the Poltergust, don't forget, now!
All right now, kiddos. Don't go tuckering yourself out. Relax, and just try to get those Boos one at a time. The trick is using the direction of the Poltergust, don't forget, now!
Your brother must've been taken by that gang of Boos... Poor feller...
Your brother must've been taken by that gang of Boos... Poor feller...
Oh now, don't talk crazy. They're not gonna eat the man. But what became of him, hm? Odd that he hasn't come back.
Oh now, don't talk crazy. They're not gonna eat the man. But what became of him, hm? Odd that he hasn't come back.
Common theory holds that Boos grow in strength when they travel in numbers. They must somehow combine their powers too... Their power likely overwhelmed your brother.
Common theory holds that Boos grow in strength when they travel in numbers. They must somehow combine their powers too... Their power likely overwhelmed your brother.
If your aim is to save Mario, there's but one way to do it: capture each Boo and slowly weaken the group's power!
If your aim is to save Mario, there's but one way to do it: capture each Boo and slowly weaken the group's power!
But Boos, as their name implies, like to hide and then jump out to scare people. You've got your work cut out finding 'em...
But Boos, as their name implies, like to hide and then jump out to scare people. You've got your work cut out finding 'em...
Heh heh heh. Don't get all down in the mouth, my boy! That Game Boy Horror I gave you has a secret function!
Heh heh heh. Don't get all down in the mouth, kiddos! That Game Boy Horror I gave you has a secret function!
I knew it'd come handy one day, so I developed it secretly. I call it the Boo Radar!
The Boo Radar will flash red when something round like a Boo is hidden nearby. Use it to search everywhere, %s!
The Boo Radar will flash red when something round like a Boo is hidden nearby. Use it to search everywhere, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.reset_mansion.1: Would you like to reset the progress in the mansion?
luigis_mansion:dialog.reset_mansion.conf: Are you sure? Doing this will reset all money collected, and progress in the mansion, for all players.
Alright. You can leave and re-enter the world to get asked if you want to reset again.
Alright. You can wait until other players clear the mansion, or leave and re-enter the world to get asked if you want to reset again.
Alright. Resetting mansion. I'm not to blame if any players are angry at you now.
luigis_mansion:dialog.reset_mansion.no.1: Alright. If you change your mind, leave and re-enter the world to get asked if you want to reset again.
luigis_mansion:dialog.sir_weston.1: HOT! OH VERY HOT! You! You're making it too HOT!
luigis_mansion:dialog.sir_weston.1.more: HOT! OH VERY HOT! You! You're making it too HOT!
luigis_mansion:dialog.sir_weston.2: I'm going to cook in this heat! I'm going to melt!
luigis_mansion:dialog.sir_weston.3: Did YOU light these fires? What were you thinking?
luigis_mansion:dialog.sir_weston.3.more: Did YOU light these fires? What were you thinking?
luigis_mansion:dialog.sir_weston.4: People who start fires in this mansion had better be ready to pay the price!!!
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_book_of_pericl: You found The Book of Pericles.
There are spirits known as Elemental Ghosts. They live in the elements of fire, water, and ice that make up much of our world.
To handle these Elements one must first obtain an Element Medal. Perhaps the Elemental Ghosts are only visible to the bearer of such medal.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.1: So your name's %s? I think our paths were destined to cross. Well met, %s.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.1.even: I've got your names on a list. I think our paths were destined to cross. Well met, kiddos.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.1.more: Many people here, huh? I think our paths were destined to cross. Well met, kiddos.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.10: That guy was your brother? Oh no! That's horrible!
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.10.mor: That guy was your brother? Oh no! That's horrible!
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.11: He wouldn't stand a chance against those ghosts without my help! You have to go after him!
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.11.mor: He wouldn't stand a chance against those ghosts without my help! You have to go after him!
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.12: Here's the plan: I'll teach you how to deal with ghosts so you can rescue your brother, %s.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.12.mor: Here's the plan: I'll teach you how to deal with ghosts so you can rescue your brother, kiddos.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.3: Why, these cozy quarters are where I do my ghost-studying. Professor E. Gadd's ghost research laboratory! The Lab, if you're of a shortening mind.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.3.more: Why, these cozy quarters are where I do my ghost-studying. Professor E. Gadd's ghost research laboratory! The Lab, if you're of a shortening mind.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.4: You won this mansion in a contest you didn't even enter? Sounds pretty fishy to me...
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.4.more: You won this mansion in a contest you didn't even enter? Sounds pretty fishy to me...
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.5: So, you believe the mansion actually exists, then... strange.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.5.more: So, you believe the mansion actually exists, then... strange.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.6: I've been living here since I was a lad of twenty or so, and I'll tell you: that mansion appeared just a few days ago! The spirits have fooled you!
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.6.more: I've been living here since I was a lad of twenty or so, and I'll tell you: that mansion appeared just a few days ago! The spirits have fooled you!
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.7: I don't know if it's a dream, an illusion, or what all, but I surely wouldn't be too happy winning a haunted house.
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.8: Now that I get a look at you, I just recalled... A guy with a red hat kind of like yours, went up to the mansion without even stopping to chat... and he never returned. Was he a dream, too?
luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.8.more: Now that I get a look at you, I just recalled... A guy with a red hat kind of like yours, went up to the mansion without even stopping to chat... and he never returned. Was he a dream, too?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.1: Boo hoo hoo! Where did you go, Mario? Waaaaaah! Wah!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.3: Waa... Wow! It's %s! You finally made it! Oh, joy! Thank goodness!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.3.more: Waa... Wow! You finally made it! Oh, joy! Thank goodness!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.4: Me? Well, Princess Peach asked me to come here to look for Mario. He left when he heard that you'd won a mansion, and he never returned!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.4.more: Me? Well, Princess Peach asked me to come here to look for Mario. He left when he heard that you'd won a mansion, and he never returned!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.5: Th... then when I arrived here, the mansion was full of ghosts, and I didn't see Mario anywhere, and I kind of freaked out a little, and I didn't know what to do!! It's been awful!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.6: Please, please, please, you HAVE to help me find Mario! If he doesn't get back, you have no idea how upset the princess will be! She'll flip!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.6.more: Please, please, please, you HAVE to help me find Mario! If he doesn't get back, you have no idea how upset the princess will be! She'll flip!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.repeat: Well, this is about all I can do for you, but...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.repeat.blac: Ohhh, that blackout was scary! I'm so glad the lights came back on! Phew!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.repeat.boos: %s! A Boo! There was this big Boo flying around here! Be extra careful!
Everybody! A Boo! There was this big Boo flying around here! Be extra careful!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.repeat.more: Well, this is about all I can do for you, but...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.1: Yay! Thanks, %s! You made my dark and stormy night!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.1.more: Yay! Thanks, everybody! You made my dark and stormy night!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.2: I wish I could do something to help you.. Wait! I've got it! At least let me do this...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.2.more: I wish I could do something to help you.. Wait! I've got it! At least let me do this...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.3: Talk to me for help anytime!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.3.more: Talk to me for help anytime!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.1: Waaaah! Waaaah! Mario, where are you? WAAAAH!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.3: Yes! %s! How lucky that you found me! I feel so much better now!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.3.more: Yes! How lucky that you found me! I feel so much better now!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.4: Please, please, PLEASE save Mario! I looked everywhere! I can't find him! Where is he?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.repeat.1: If there's anything I can do...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.repeat.1.mo: If there's anything I can do...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.1: Sniffle... I, uh... dropped a REALLY important thing into the toilet. I didn't mean to!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.repeat.1: Even I can help out, %s! Really!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.repeat.1.mo: Even I can help out, everybody! Really!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.yes.1: Heyy... You're right! No point crying over spilt milk!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.yes.1.more: Heyy... You're right! No point crying over spilt milk!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.yes.2: I suppose I'll just flush that old worry away. Yup, I'll just let it swirl on down to the depths and let happiness refill me life!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.yes.2.more: I suppose I'll just flush that old worry away. Yup, I'll just let it swirl on down to the depths and let happiness refill me life!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.1: You saw him, didn't you? How could they DO that to Mario?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.1.more: You saw him, didn't you? How could they DO that to Mario?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.2: When I saw him like that, I completely lost it and ran through the mansion looking for a hiding place.
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.3: While I was running, though, I did happen to notice that Mario left some of his things laying around the place.
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.4: A hat, a glove, a shoe, a letter, and a star. I saw five items altogether.
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.5: I'd go collect them for you if I could remember where they were. Yeah... I probably should've picked some up...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.5.more: I'd go collect them for you if I could remember where they were. Yeah... I probably should've picked some up...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.look.1: Sniff... sob... Suh-something TERRIBLE is in that well...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.repeat.1: By the way, I have a good idea about what to do with Mario's things!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.repeat.1.al: I'll stay here, if that's OK...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.repeat.no.1: Mario dropped five items: a hat, a glove, a shoe, a letter, and a star. Thanks for looking for them!
Mario dropped five items: a hat, a glove, a shoe, a letter, and a star. Thanks for looking for them!
There's a ghost around here somewhere who can see the future by touching a person's personal effects! Her name is Madame Clairvoya.
I'm sure Madame Clairvoya would be able to tell you how Mario got turned into a painting if she had those items.
I'm sure Madame Clairvoya would be able to tell you how Mario got turned into a painting if she had those items.
Why don't you try showing those items to her?
Why don't you try showing those items to her?
She seems to linger in the room with the crystal ball...
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.yes.1: Whaa-huh? Really?! You'll find all Mario's items for me?!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.yes.1.more: Whaa-huh? Really?! You'll find all Mario's items for me?!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.1: ...He-Hello? ...May I ask who is speaking... please?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.2: Whew! It's me, Toad! I don't know what I would have done if a ghost had answered!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.3: Anyway, we have a terrible problem! The lightning caused a blackout all over the house! What should we do?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.4: We're really, REALLY afraid of the dark! Isn't there a way you can turn the lights back on?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.4.more: We're really, REALLY afraid of the dark! Isn't there a way you can turn the lights back on?
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.5: Huh? No, we don't know how to turn the lights back on. We were hoping you'd know... SNIFF! Oh, me!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.5.more: Huh? No, we don't know how to turn the lights back on. We were hoping you'd know... SNIFF! Oh, me!
luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.6: But... now that I think about it, I do remember seeing a large breaker switch somewhere in the basement...
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.0: %s, that was a sorry effort! Why I bet your brother would be laughing fit to split if he saw you. Try again from the beginning, OK?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.0.mo: Kiddos, that was a sorry effort! Why I bet your brother would be laughing fit to split if he saw you. Try again from the beginning, OK?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.1: That's the vacuum cleaner I engineered to catch ghosts, I call it... this is genius... the Poltergust 3000! It can suck up all kinds of things. Let 'er rip!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.1.mo: Those're the vacuum cleaners I engineered to catch ghosts, I call them... this is genius... the Poltergust 3000s! They can suck up all kinds of things. Let 'em rip!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.10: Just give it a try. You'll learn more that way than just listen to me yap about it.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.10.m: Just give it a try. You'll learn more that way than just listen to me yap about it.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.11: Remember, as soon as you see a ghost's heart, that's your chance to vacuum 'em up!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.11.m: Remember, as soon as you see a ghost's heart, that's your chance to vacuum 'em up!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.12: While vacuuming, move in the opposite direction to bring 'em in!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.12.m: While vacuuming, move in the opposite direction to bring 'em in!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.13: When that surprised ghost's heart appears, vacuum it by selecting the Poltergust.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.13.m: When that surprised ghost's heart appears, vacuum it by selecting the Poltergust.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.14: Move in the direction opposite of the ghost.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.14.m: Move in the direction opposite of the ghost.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.15: Move in the opposite direction quickly and rapidly for the best results!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.16: You have to get as close as you can before flashing the light.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.16.m: You have to get as close as you can before flashing the light.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.17: Surprise 'em with the light when they get close! Pow! Pow! The more, the better! Got it?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.17.m: Surprise 'em with the light when they get close! Pow! Pow! The more, the better! Got it?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.18.b: Hey kiddo, shape up! You can't go looking for your brother the way you're carrying on!
Hey kiddos, shape up! You can't go looking for your brother the way you're carrying on!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.18.g: Ghosts love to hide in dark places. Isn't that a hoot?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.2: Select it to vacuum and use it to toggle vacuuming and expelling.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.20: Catching ghosts means using the flashlight and the Poltergust 3000 as a team, you get me, young feller?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.20.m: Catching ghosts means using the flashlights and the Poltergust 3000s as a team, you get me, young fellers?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.22: Well, how many did you get?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.22.m: Well, how many did you get?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.23.1: My, my, just one. Pretty poor.
WOW! Ten ghosts! Positively dazzling, kiddos!
WOW! Eleven ghosts! I am plumb astonished, %s!
WOW! Eleven ghosts! I am plumb astonished, kiddos!
Hoo, I can't count that high! %s, you're a prodigy!!
Hoo, I can't count that high! Kiddos, you're prodigies!!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.23.4: Hmm... four ghosts. Not so bad.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.23.5: Five ghosts, huh? You're getting the hang of it, %s!
Five ghosts, huh? You're getting the hang of it, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.23.7: Hey, seven ghosts! That's how to do it, %s!
Hey, seven ghosts! That's how to do it, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.23.8: Yowzer, eight ghosts! Go get those ghouls, %s!
Yowzer, eight ghosts! Go get those ghouls, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.24.b: Move in the opposite direction of the ghost.
Move in the opposite direction of the ghost.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.24.g: I'd say you're ready to look for your brother now.
I'd say you're ready to look for your brother now.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.25: Fine, fine. Looks like you worked up quite a sweat there.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.25.m: Fine, fine. Looks like you worked up quite a sweat there.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.26: How about a little cool-down in the gallery? I'm quite proud of it, you know...
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.26.m: How about a little cool-down in the gallery? I'm quite proud of it, you know...
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.3: No matter how strong you think your brother is...
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.3.mo: No matter how strong you think your brother is...
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.4: Ghosts are mysterious beings... They can't be caught using conventional means.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.5: So you'd better use this! It's the only way to foil 'em! This is the only thing they fear!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.5.mo: So you'd better use this! It's the only way to foil 'em! This is the only thing they fear!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.6: Or something to that effect... Ahem! Well, how about we start your training?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.6.mo: Or something to that effect... Ahem! Well, how about we start your training?
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.7: Ghosts seem to like darkness and they avoid the light.
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.8: So if you hit 'em with a flashlight beam all of a sudden, you can stun 'em momentarily! Then it's vacuuming time!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.8.mo: So if you hit 'em with a flashlight beam all of a sudden, you can stun 'em momentarily! Then it's vacuuming time!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.9: When you see your chance, hold the Poltergust 3000 and move in the opposite direction of the ghost!
luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.9.mo: When you see your chance, hold the Poltergust 3000 and move in the opposite direction of the ghost!
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.1: Hey mister, what are you doing over there all by yourself?
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.1.more: Hey everybody, what are you doing over there all by yourselves?
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.2: Hey... Why don't you play hide and seek with us?
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.2.more: Hey... Why don't you play hide and seek with us?
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.3: Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.game.1: OOOO-KAAAAY! You can come in now...
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.game.1.more: OOOO-KAAAAY! You can come in now...
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.game.3: HEY! That's not right! Play fair, cheater!
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.game.3.more: HEY! That's not right! Play fair, cheaters!
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.yes.2: OK, we're gonna hide now. Wait outside!
luigis_mansion:dialog.twins.yes.2.more: OK, we're gonna hide now. Wait outside!
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.2: Oh, sorry to surprise you, boy! It's me, Professor E. Gadd... Sorry for disturbing you.
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.2.mo: Oh, sorry to surprise you, kiddos! It's me, Professor E. Gadd... Sorry for disturbing you.
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.3: I know I usually contact you by Game Boy Horror, but I thought I'd use this phone since you were in the room...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.3.mo: I know I usually contact you by Game Boy Horror, but I thought I'd use this phone since you were in the room...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.5: You know that all ghosts avoid the light and hide in the dark...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.5.mo: You know that all ghosts avoid the light and hide in the dark...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.6: But listen, now. There's one ghost who fled from the gallery who only hides in the darkest places... His name... is Uncle Grimmly...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.6.mo: But listen, now. There's one ghost who fled from the gallery who only hides in the darkest places... His name... is Uncle Grimmly...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.7: If he's on the loose, then now may be your only chance to get him... Why don't you try looking for him before you get those lights back on? Might be wise...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.7.mo: If he's on the loose, then now may be your only chance to get him... Why don't you try looking for him before you get those lights back on? Might be wise...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.8: He's old for a ghost, but it's only made him more cautious. I do know, though, that for some reason he tends to prefer rooms with mirrors...
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.9: Uh-oh, the ghosts are starting to approach your position! Be careful, %s!
luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.9.mo: Uh-oh, the ghosts are starting to approach your position! Be careful, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:dialog.underground_lab.ch: Everyone should get back to the lab first before changing mansions.
luigis_mansion:dialog.underground_lab.ol: Are you sure? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
Are you sure? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
luigis_mansion:dialog.vincent_van_gore.1: Eet eez you, no? You interfere with my afterlife's work!
Eet eez you, no? You interfere with my afterlife's work!
luigis_mansion:dialog.vincent_van_gore.2: You filthy swine! You're blind to zee life I give my creations!
You filthy swines! You're blind to zee life I give my creations!
luigis_mansion:dialog.vincent_van_gore.3: Zen very well... I will show you zee mastery of my art!
Zen very well... I will show you zee mastery of my art!
luigis_mansion:dialog.vincent_van_gore.5: But even if I disappear, my work will live on... Zat eez right, n'est-ce pas? Art eez eternal!
luigis_mansion:dialog.vincent_van_gore.7: You say zat only one of my creations eez left?
One of you zaid zat only one of my creations eez left?
luigis_mansion:dialog.washroom_toad.2: Actually, I'm afraid to leave because of all the Boos out there. Are there still Boos in this area?
luigis_mansion:dialog.water_element_meda: Hey now, %s! What have you stumbled across?
Hey now, kiddos! What have you stumbled across?
Now you can use the Water Element!
Now you can use the Water Element!
My research shows that these particular Elemental Ghosts leave their watery dwellings whenever you approach. You know the drill... vacuum 'em up!
My research shows that these particular Elemental Ghosts leave their watery dwellings whenever you approach. You know the drill... vacuum 'em up!
Use your Poltergust to expel 'em once they're vacuumed! If you sneak while expelling, you can shoot out a big ball of water!
Use your Poltergusts to expel 'em once they're vacuumed! If you sneak while expelling, you can shoot out a big ball of water!
I hear there are some ghosts who can be defeated only with water, actually... Also, remember that water has purifying properties, so use it well...
Don't get too caught up with your new squirt gun, %s!
Don't get too caught up with your new squirt guns, kiddos!
luigis_mansion:furniture.table_mounted_t: Table Mounted Tea Set and Huge Candelabra
luigis_mansion:furniture.wooden_cabinet_: Wooden Cabinet Mounted Wooden Colorful Candelabra
luigis_mansion:furniture.wooden_stool_mo: Wooden Stool Mounted Orange Stained Vase

luigis_mansion:item.menu.game_boy_horror: This kind of Bodybuilder loves muscles and lilies. Why lilies? They symbolize purity.
A product of the mansion's fear and despair. He's not sure who to fear or what to despair these days.
When the shy, timid boos get together, their body and their attribute get BIG!
He cries loudly and never sleeps through the night, but since he was born a ghost, this seems natural.
They once belonged to a tightly-wound toy collector. But they now march on their own without any winding.
The Dancing Couple: The Floating Whirlindas
Once the local waltz champions. They can no longer compete since their feet don't touch the floor.
The Twin Brothers: Henry and Orville
They love to play hide and seek. But since they both hide, the game never ends.
He loved antique jars so much that he now lives in one. He can hardly contain himself!
She's stashed her savings away to prepare for her long afterlife.
The Freaky Fortune Teller: Madame Clairvoya
Her close connection to the spirit world lets her see nearly 49 days into the future.
Despite playing moving melodies, she has a surly disposition. Oddly enough, she loves video games.
The Miss ghost runner-up from six years ago. She hasn't had much modeling work lately.
He prefers all-you-can-eat buffets to three meals a day. He ate himself to death but still wasn't satisfied.
She's still knitting the scarf she never finished in life. It now stretches to 871 feet.
Neville spends his afterlife reading all the books he missed while living.
He wanders the house, endlessly searching for his master's will. He hopes he's included in it!
This strange fellow's icy abode may be the reason he hasn't warmed up to being a ghost.
Slim's a legend in the world of competitive pool. Too bad he's never played a living soul.
This creepy canine will sink its chops into any seemingly edible thing in sight.
What was meant to be a short nap seems to have turned into eternal rest for sweet Sue Pea.
Adrift in the darkness, he tends to keep to himself, which suits the rest of the family just fine.
The Starving Artist: Vincent Van Gore
Despite failing to sell a single painting in 30 years, this stubborn man refuses to let his art die.
The intended brightness of the map is controlled via the dimensions. If you set it lower, you may not see anything.
The GUI scale should be set to anything except the highest scale, if it is set to the highest scale, some text will go off screen.
Music is assigned to the music slider, and the Ambience slider if there are multiple tracks at once. Luigi's humming is controlled via the Player slider.
Sounds are assigned to their proper slider, ghosts assigned to Hostile Creatures, E. Gadd to Friendly Creatures, etc.
Lowest used difficulty's score multiplier is applied for the selected mansion
You can change this setting even without this menu by modifying the game difficulty.
Open Map When Collecting a Key

luigis_mansion:message.player.scan_furni: What a dreadful picture... But that candle next to it might be important...
I bet I'd look pretty tough wearing one of these...
Mario might be able to lift this...
Mmmmm, very elegant...
I bet those would fall if I gave this a good shake...
I'd like to visit outer space someday...
That looks like it might be fun to twirl...
I wish I had time to straighten this mess up a bit...
Is there any particular reason for making this so long and slender? Weird...
Now this just looks like it's in the way...
For some reason I feel like spinning that...
Hmm... frozen solid. It makes me cold just looking at it.
One really shouldn't open this kind of thing without asking...
That looks cold... Hey! I can see my breath!
A fire feels good on a night as cold as this...
Ugggh! I don't think this door is going to open...
Ah this is %s, hopefully they are useful in this adventure.
And here we have the exquisite %s outside their natural habitat.
The mighty %s... maybe shoving a plastic, multi-functional device in their face isn't the best way to forge friendships.
Scanned %s... why?
Flashlight in hand, Game Boy Horror in reach, Poltergust 3000 at the ready, %s is prepared to venture forth!
%s seems to have sustained some injuries... perhaps a rest could help.
%s is certainly alive...
Nothing unusual here... Boring!
%s is barely holding on...
The infamous coin hoarding %s!
Detective %s! I don't even need to check their license or job history!
Ghostbuster %s! Hope they don't capture me in the process!
I don't think I can reach that directly...
Now that I look at it-- it's full of moth holes! Yecch!
So much dust! This will never pass the white-glove test!
Well, they sure did pile odds and ends everywhere... Filthy.
Oh, what's this?! Just how I like it... Nice and clean!
Well, I sure can't read that from here...
I wonder how old this is...
I'm willing to bet there's something cold in here.
I've been wanting one of these for quite a while...
Oh, wow... I've always wanted one of these!
What kind of picture is this?
I really have no use for this...
Not particularly interesting...
Hmmm... Weird...
Awww, poor thing...
How could anyone treat an animal that way? I won't stand for it!!
Oh, what's this?! This would sure fetch a pretty penny...
Looks like something might be in there...
Personally, I've always liked the bottom bunk a bit better...
Now, that's a classic. I wonder how much it would sell for.
If you look closely, you can tell it's really just a photograph!
This looks like it might break if I sit on it...
Man, I'm tired... That bed sure looks comfy.
I could just curl up there and sleep until dawn...
Now who is this supposed to be?
Was someone trying to show off or what?
What's this?! Looks fancy!
HAHAHA! Who designed this?!
There's something fishy here...
Well, at least we won't have a shortage of toilet paper...
I really should work out more. Maybe I ought to throw a few quick jabs while I'm here...
I'm not so interested in bikes...
I've always been a good runner...
I don't care much for pointy objects...
It looks old, but I bet it still has a nice tone...
Hmm. Should I play it?
I never could play the piano...
Looks like a fun place to make shadow puppets...
Looks like this hasn't gotten much use of late...
What's this, an antique?
Now that's just not my style.
Wouldn't it be nice if I could raise carrier pigeons here?
What in the world is this?
This is the kind of thing I would put in the bathroom...
Fabulous!
Exquisite...
Looks ordinary... A little TOO ordinary.
I should probably give that a quick vacuuming...
(Way to go, genius... Do you have the hang of that thing yet?)
What's this?! This certainly adds to the atmosphere of the place...
Looks pretty normal to me...
You know... I never noticed how cute those red polka dots look on top!
Boy, that looks hot... Someone should probably cool it off.
Simply delightful...
Just like a real person... how very creepy.
Looks rather old and fragile...
Boy, those Boos sure did make a realistic fake mansion...
Breathtaking! A simple design with a dash of casual elegance!
Gosh, I am just so finicky when it comes to hats...
These look kind of comfortable... No, I'll stick with my buds!
This looks pricey...
Now THAT is what I call interior decorating!
It's a picture...but I wouldn't call it art.
No one's watered this in a long time... How very sad.
I think I used to have one of these! Yeah, I did!
Hey, it's flower season, isn't it? I almost forgot!
If that's an antique, I'll eat my hat.
I could just gaze at one of these for hours...
That would be a good spot to hide some savings...
I hope that's sturdier than it looks...
This could be handy in case of fire...
Yuck! Talk about filthy!
Wh-What's this...? Eeek! Oh... It's just a chair.
This looks quite old... I wonder how much it would sell for.
Do Boos wash their faces?
For some reason, this makes me feel profound sadness...
It must have been quite a chore to keep this old mansion clean...
Now honestly, when it comes to hats, they really must be hand washed. There's simply no substituce. I know Mario likes to put his through the washing machine, but that just seems careless to me...
Did someone win a championship for this or what?
Maybe I should get some of those do-it-yourself books...
I'm quite taken with this...
If only there were a couple of cookies or something in there...
Candlelight makes any ordinary room simply beautiful...
The candle on that table looks kind of... weird.
I wonder why only this one's frozen...
What a hunk of junk! You expect me to sit on that? Please! I have standards!
I wonder if there are any goodies there...
Didn't anyone ever tell these ghosts not to waste water?
What's written on that sign?
What a lovely crystal ball! You know, these give off such a beautiful glow when light shines on them... I wonder if my flashlight would work...
I guess you just can't plan for this sort of thing...
Huh...?
Aww, it's gone out. Would relighting it do any good?
How disturbing...
It's a statue... A very tall angel statue by the looks of it...
